code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../Styles/DeletePhoto.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE_URL='https://familia-gouveia-0f628f261ee1.herokuapp.com';const DeletePhoto=()=>{const[photos,setPhotos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/components/eliminarPhoto.php")).then(response=>{setPhotos(response.data);});},[]);const deletePhoto=id=>{const userConfirmation=window.confirm("Tem certeza que deseja eliminar a fotografia?");if(userConfirmation){axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/components/exclusaoPhoto.php?id=").concat(id)).then(response=>{console.log(response.data);setPhotos(photos.filter(photo=>photo.id!==id));alert("A fotografia foi eliminada com sucesso!");});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"deletePhoto",children:photos.map(photo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{width:"100%",height:350,src:"".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/components/uploadsFotos/").concat(photo.foto),alt:photo.nome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:photo.nome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deletePhoto(photo.id),children:"Eliminar"})]},photo.id))});};export default DeletePhoto;
